org.jclouds.ec2.features
Interface InstanceAsyncApi

All Superinterfaces:
InstanceAsyncClient
public interface InstanceAsyncApi
extends InstanceAsyncClient

Provides access to EC2 via their REST API.

Note that this class is transitionary and will fully replace its parent in 1.7.

Author:
Adrian Cole
